item.title: EP 210 - ET Phones Us: Should We Read Messages From Space?
item.itunes:title: ET Phones Us: Should We Read Messages From Space?
item.description:
Today we sit in court and watch a horrifying event take place. Then, we look to the stars to examine whether or not we should read anything an alien sends us!

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Fraudster pours acid over his face in the DOCK causing 'life-threatening injuries'

https://www.dailystar.co.uk/news/latest-news/775924/Marc-Marshall-acid-dock-sentencing-fraud-london-court

 

Man pours acid on himself as judge passes jail sentence

https://www.bbc.com/news/uk-48114760

 

Mysterious New Mineral Discovered But We Can Only See Its ‘Ghost’

http://www.messagetoeagle.com/mysterious-new-mineral-discovered-but-we-can-only-see-its-ghost/

 

If We Receive a Message From Aliens, Should We Delete It Without Reading?

https://www.sciencealert.com/new-study-argues-that-if-we-receive-a-message-from-aliens-maybe-we-should-delete-it-without-reading

 

"Interstellar communication. IX. Message decontamination is impossible"

https://arxiv.org/pdf/1802.02180.pdf

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

 

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018
